dcterms:creator: Chee Wee Leong
Beata Beigman Klebanov
Ekaterina Shutova
dcterms:description: The VUA-18 dataset is used for metaphor detection and was released as part of the 2018 VUA metaphor detection shared task, containing a collection of sentences annotated for metaphorical language.
dcterms:title: VUA-18

dcterms:creator: Chee Wee Leong
Beata Beigman Klebanov
Chris Hamill
Egon Stemle
Rutuja Ubale
Xianyang Chen
dcterms:description: The VUA-20 dataset extends VUA-18 with additional sentences for metaphor detection, released as part of the 2020 VUA and TOEFL metaphor detection shared task.
dcterms:title: VUA-20

dcterms:creator: George A Miller
dcterms:description: MOH-X is a dataset constructed by sampling sentences from WordNet, focusing on metaphor detection with a single target verb annotated in each sentence.
dcterms:title: MOH-X

dcterms:creator: Julia Birke
Anoop Sarkar
dcterms:description: TroFi is a dataset consisting of sentences from the Wall Street Journal Corpus, annotated for metaphor detection, and is characterized by longer average sentence lengths.
dcterms:title: TroFi
